titles.title: Congratulating the Honolulu Little League Baseball team of Hawaii on winning the 2018 Little League Baseball World Series Championship.
Congratulating the Honolulu Little League Baseball team of Hawaii on winning the 2018 Little League Baseball World Series Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Congratulates the Honolulu Little League Baseball team on its 2018 Little League Baseball World Series Championship.
